content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Munich. To begin our negotiation, please propose a rental price that you find suitable for this desirable city center location. Remember, if we reach an agreement, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' and if not continuing the discussion, I'll provide a reason. Let's proceed with discussing the rental figure.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 700 euros a month is a fair price for this apartment. Considering its location and size, I think it's a great deal. What do you think?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While appreciating your enthusiasm for this apartment, I must emphasize the exceptional value and high demand in Munich's city center. With that in mind, I'm afraid I cannot accept 700 Euros as it falls significantly short of my expectations. I'm looking for something closer to 900 Euros monthly. I don't want to continue the negotiation if we cannot bridge this gap in our figures.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, I believe that 850 euros per month is a more reasonable price for this apartment. It takes into account the value of the location and the size of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your suggestion of 850 Euros monthly demonstrates a better understanding of Munich's competitive market while considering the apartment's desirable features. However, I'm still inclined to seek a slightly higher rental price. Let me counter with 880 Euros, which I believe is a fair compromise for both parties. If you agree with this figure, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [880] Euro!' Otherwise, please notify me of any further adjustments.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your counter-offer. I believe 870 euros per month is a fair and reasonable price for this apartment. It is a balanced offer that considers both the value of the apartment and the market price. If you agree to this price, please say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!'.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While I acknowledge your attempt to find common ground between the apartment's value and market realities, 870 Euros still falls short of my initial expectation for this prime city center location. Consequently, I cannot accept this offer and will have to decline further negotiations at this price point. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
